info.description: These endpoints are used to feed the open contracting dashboard
info.title: Open Contracting Dashboards API

tags.description: Tender Price By Type Year Controller

tags.description: Average Number Of Tenderers Excel Controller

get.summary: Calculates the average award period, per each year. The year is taken from awards.date and the duration is taken by counting the daysbetween tender.tenderPeriod.endDate and tender.tenderPeriod.startDate. The award has to be active.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the year parameter has one value.

parameters.name: monthly
parameters.description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly grouping of all results. The default is false

parameters.name: bidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id

parameters.name: notBidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: procuringEntityId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notProcuringEntityId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: bidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.procurementMethodDetails.Valid examples are Đấu thầu rộng rãi, Đấu thầu hạn chế, etc...

parameters.name: notBidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: contrMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from 1 to 5.

parameters.name: tenderLoc
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id

parameters.name: minTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.

parameters.name: minAwardValue
parameters.description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxAwardValue
parameters.description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/awardValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.

parameters.name: procuringEntityCityId
parameters.description: This will search after the City Id of the procuring entity.The field is organization.address.postalCode

parameters.name: procuringEntityDepartmentId
parameters.description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The field is organization.department._id

parameters.name: procuringEntityGroupId
parameters.description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The field is organization.group._id

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: This is the page number to be displayed. If unspecified it starts with the first page which is page 0

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: This defines how many elements to display on each page. It defaults to 300 .You can have a maximum of 1000 elements on each page.Larger values are not allowed because they can crash your browser.

The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the year parameter has one value.

parameters.name: monthly
parameters.description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly grouping of all results. The default is false

parameters.name: bidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id

parameters.name: notBidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: procuringEntityId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notProcuringEntityId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: bidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.procurementMethodDetails.Valid examples are Đấu thầu rộng rãi, Đấu thầu hạn chế, etc...

parameters.name: notBidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: contrMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from 1 to 5.

parameters.name: tenderLoc
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id

parameters.name: minTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.

parameters.name: procuringEntityGroupId

get.summary: Returns the frequent suppliers of a procuringEntity split by a time interval. The time interval is a parameter and represents the number of days to take as interval, starting with today and going back till the last award date. The awards are grouped by procuringEntity, supplier and the time interval. maxAwards parameter is used to designate what is the maximum number of awards granted to one supplier by the same procuringEntity inside one timeInterval. The default value for maxAwards is 3 (days) and the default value for intervalDays is 365.

parameters.name: intervalDays
parameters.description: intervalDays

parameters.name: maxAwards
parameters.description: maxAwards

The awards are grouped by procuringEntity, supplier and the time interval. maxAwards parameter is used to designate what is the maximum number of awards granted to one supplier by the same procuringEntity inside one timeInterval. The default value for maxAwards is 3 (days) and the default value for intervalDays is 365.

parameters.name: intervalDays
parameters.description: intervalDays

parameters.name: maxAwards
parameters.description: maxAwards

post.summary: Detect frequent pairs of tenderers that apply together to bids.We are only showing pairs if they applied to more than one bid together.We are sorting the results after the number of occurences, descending.You can use all the filters that are available along with pagination options.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. post.summary: Exports *Procurement method* dashboard in Excel format.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the year parameter has one value.

parameters.name: monthly

post.summary: Percent of awarded tenders with >1 tenderer/bidderCount of tenders with numberOfTenderers >1 divided by total count of tenders with numberOfTenderers >0This endpoint uses tender.tenderPeriod.startDate to calculate the tender year.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the year parameter has one value.

parameters.name: monthly
parameters.description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly grouping of all results. The default is false

parameters.name: bidTypeId

parameters.name: notBidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notProcuringEntityId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id

parameters.name: notBidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: procuringEntityId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notProcuringEntityId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: bidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.procurementMethodDetails.Valid examples are Đấu thầu rộng rãi, Đấu thầu hạn chế, etc...

parameters.name: notBidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: contrMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from 1 to 5.

parameters.name: tenderLoc
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id

parameters.name: minTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.

parameters.name: minAwardValue
parameters.description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxAwardValue
parameters.description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/awardValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.

parameters.name: procuringEntityCityId
parameters.description: This will search after the City Id of the procuring entity.The field is organization.address.postalCode

parameters.name: procuringEntityDepartmentId
parameters.description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The field is organization.department._id

parameters.name: procuringEntityGroupId
parameters.description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The field is organization.group._id

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: This is the page number to be displayed. If unspecified it starts with the first page which is page 0

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: This defines how many elements to display on each page. It defaults to 300 .You can have a maximum of 1000 elements on each page.Larger values are not allowed because they can crash your browser.

get.summary: Calculates percentage of releases with tender with at least one specified delivery location, that is the array tender.items.deliveryLocation has to have items.Filters out stub tenders, therefore tender.tenderPeriod.startDate has to exist.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the year parameter has one value.

parameters.name: monthly
parameters.description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly grouping of all results. The default is false

parameters.name: bidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id

parameters.name: notBidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: procuringEntityId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notProcuringEntityId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notBidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: contrMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from 1 to 5.

parameters.name: tenderLoc
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id

parameters.name: minTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.

parameters.name: minAwardValue
parameters.description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.name: maxAwardValue

get.summary: Returns the top ten largest active tenders. The amount is taken from the tender.value.amount field. The returned data will containthe following fields: planning.bidNo, tender.date, tender.value.amount, tender.tenderPeriod, tender.procuringEntity.name

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the year parameter has one value.

parameters.name: monthly
parameters.description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly grouping of all results. The default is false

parameters.name: bidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id

parameters.name: notBidTypeId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: procuringEntityId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: notProcuringEntityId
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds to the OCDS Organization.identifier

parameters.name: bidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.procurementMethodDetails.Valid examples are Đấu thầu rộng rãi, Đấu thầu hạn chế, etc...

parameters.name: notBidSelectionMethod
parameters.description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches elements that are NOT in the list of Ids

parameters.name: contrMethod
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from 1 to 5.

parameters.name: tenderLoc
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id

parameters.name: minTenderValue
parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.

parameters.description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
